features.title: Public Documentation
features.description: New end-user documentation site with video introduction. Learn Inkstone with comprehensive guides and tutorials.

features.title: Document Pagination
features.description: Load More button for projects with many documents. Better performance when browsing large projects.

features.title: Auto-Scroll Improvements
features.description: Message list auto-scrolls to new content. Doc Explorer scrolls to active project on load.

features.title: Editor Agent Fixes
features.description: Fixed alias maps, text deletion, markdown spacing, and document renaming via assistant.

features.title: Proofreading & Fact-Check Polish
features.description: Improved suggestion loading when switching docs. Better highlighting and more reliable results.

features.title: Open in New Thread
features.description: Deep Research and Web Search now open in dedicated threads by default. Keeps your conversations organized.

features.title: Improved Thread Tabs
features.description: New tabs open to the right consistently. Closing a tab keeps the thread available in your project.

features.title: Clearer Thread Names
features.description: Thread titles now show your actual query instead of system instructions. Easier to find past conversations.

features.title: Bulk Archive
features.description: Select multiple documents and archive them at once. Keep your workspace tidy without the tedium.

features.title: Color Picker in Toolbar
features.description: New color picker in the editor toolbar for text and highlight colors. Pick any color with the eyedropper tool.

features.title: Dynamic Token Limits
features.description: AI agents now intelligently adjust output token limits based on task complexity for better results.

features.title: New Panel Layout
features.description: Rebuilt the entire app layout using CSS Grid. Panels now resize smoothly and remember your preferences.

features.title: Proofreading Agent Fixes
features.description: Improved accuracy and speed of the proofreading agent. Better handling of complex sentences and technical writing.

features.title: Editor Performance
features.description: Significant performance optimizations for large documents. Smoother scrolling and faster typing response.

features.title: Overlord Agent
features.description: New meta-orchestrator that intelligently routes your requests to the right specialized agent. Just describe what you need.

features.title: Independent Scroll Panels
features.description: Document panel, AI assistant, and sidebar now scroll independently. No more fighting with nested scrollbars.

features.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
features.description: New keyboard shortcuts for common actions. Press ? to see the full list.

features.title: Deep Research Agent
features.description: Comprehensive research on any topic with hierarchical exploration. Get cited sources and structured findings.

features.title: Fact-Check Agent
features.description: Automatically extract claims from your document and verify them against reliable sources.

features.title: Web Search Integration
features.description: Quick web searches powered by Tavily. Get real-time information without leaving your document.

working: AI Assistant (Deep Research, Web Search, Proofreading, Fact Checking)
alphaStatus.modelInfo: Currently using Claude Sonnet 4 as the main agent, with Gemini 2.5 Flash & GPT-4.1 for backend tasks.
